jsocket.datagram

Class DatagramImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsocket.datagram.DatagramImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Datagram
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StringDatagramImpl

    public class DatagramImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Datagram
    Wraps a DatagramSocket and simply sends and receives DatagramPacket Base class of this subpackage Lowest level in abstraction.
    Version:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Will Czifro

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Constructor wraps DatagramSocket and sets default InetAddress and port
